title: jIvanAna dEvan
sahitya:
jIvanAna dEvan unad-aruL enakkaruLvAi


anupallavi

  unadu samUham AvalODu nADit-tADip-pADuvOm


caraNam 1    enadu poruLum Avi dEham unadena muzhu manadoDu tara
shApamAna pAvan yAvum pariharittiDa param sukhittiDa
    caraNam 2    unadu aruLum AshIrvAdam enaduDan iru ulagamu vara
kAvilAna jIva nIDu kani parittiDa miga pusittiDa
    caraNam 3    unadaDi tozhum abhirAmum uyar pera manamagizhoDu vara
pAvam yAvum nIkki jIva padam aLittiDa maDi tarittiDa
